articles.title: Rookies Gorman and Liberatore have a blast powering Cardinals to 8-3 win vs. Brewers - St. Louis Post-Dispatch
articles.description: Cardinals power prospect has four hits, including first big-league homer, and four RBIs while best friend and lefty nets first MLB win with five scoreless innings.
